npcs.name: Garrick Stonehand
npcs.quote: Gold is temporary, but honor is forever.
npcs.appearance: Garrick has a thick brown beard that falls all the way down to his chest. His skin is rough and leathery from years spent in front of hot forges.
npcs.personality: Garrick is honest to a fault, and he takes great pride in his work. He is quick to make friends, but slow to forgive those who cross him or betray his trust.
npcs.definingmoment: A few years ago, Garrick discovered that a group of bandits had been raiding small towns in the area. He rallied a group of fellow dwarves and led a successful attack against the bandit hideout, earning the respect of many in the community.
npcs.plothook: Garrick has been tasked with crafting a special weapon for the local lord, but he needs help finding a rare ingredient. He's willing to pay adventurers handsomely for their assistance.
npcs.secret: Garrick has a secret stash of rare and valuable gems that he keeps hidden away in his workshop. He's never told anyone about it, and he's not likely to anytime soon.
npcs.personalityquirk: Garrick has a habit of muttering to himself when he's deep in thought, and sometimes he forgets that other people are around.

npcs.name: Kethryllia Shadowborn
npcs.quote: I learned everything I know on the streets, and I'm not afraid to use it.
npcs.appearance: Kethryllia is a lithe elf with jet black hair that cascades down her back. She has piercing blue eyes that seem to look straight through you, and a smirk that never leaves her lips.
npcs.personality: Kethryllia is confident, cunning, and quick-witted. She trusts no one, but is always willing to lend a helping hand to those in need.
npcs.definingmoment: Kethryllia's life changed forever when she was forced to kill her own brother in self-defense. She vowed to never let anyone get close enough to hurt her like that again.
npcs.plothook: Kethryllia is a master thief and assassin who has been hired to steal a powerful artifact from a wealthy noble. She needs the party's help to pull off the heist, but can they trust her?
npcs.secret: Kethryllia is actually a member of a secret organization of assassins who are working to take down a corrupt government from the inside.
npcs.personalityquirk: Kethryllia can't resist the temptation to steal something shiny and valuable whenever she sees it.

npcs.name: Gormash the Bloody
npcs.quote: I live for the thrill of battle and the spill of blood.
npcs.appearance: Gormash is a hulking brute of an orc, standing at over 7 feet tall with rippling muscles and jagged scars covering his green skin. He exudes a savage intensity that is matched only by the ferocity of his battle cry.
npcs.personality: Gormash is a ruthless and bloodthirsty warrior who will stop at nothing to achieve victory in battle. He has little regard for the lives of others and revels in the chaos and destruction of combat.
npcs.definingmoment: Gormash's thirst for blood and conquest was ignited when he witnessed the slaughter of his entire clan at the hands of a rival orc tribe. He swore to avenge his fallen kin and has been waging a brutal campaign of revenge ever since.
npcs.plothook: Gormash and his band of mercenaries have been hired by a local warlord to aid in their campaign of conquest. As the party crosses paths with Gormash, they must navigate the dangerous and unpredictable world of mercenary politics and decide where their loyalties lie.
npcs.secret: Despite his fearsome reputation, Gormash harbors a deep-seated fear of magic, which he believes to be a tool of weakness and cowardice.
npcs.personalityquirk: Gormash has a habit of referring to himself in the third person, as if he is narrating his own story.

items.name: The Book of Forgotten Memories
items.description: This leather-bound book is filled with blank pages that magically fill with the memories of the people who hold it. When a person first touches the book, they must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC 15). On a failed save, they lose a random memory from their past. On a successful save, they gain insight into a previously forgotten memory. The book can be used once per day, and each use causes the pages to turn yellow and brittle. If the book is used too many times, it will crumble to dust.

items.name: The Amulet of Unbroken Will
items.description: This amulet is made of a silver chain that holds a clear crystal in the center. When worn, it grants the wearer the ability to maintain their mental focus and resist any attempts to break their will. The amulet's power can be activated by the wearer, and any mental effects or conditions that would cause the wearer to lose control of their actions or thoughts are instantly dispelled. This includes charms, curses, and other forms of magical or mental control. The amulet also provides the wearer with resistance to psychic damage.
